title: 820-3437-B // damaged missing components due to corrosion
message:
In Looking trough the schematics the following components are missing/damaged and is it possible to replace the missing ones with the following

Blown Inductor:

L75020 2.2UH-20%-13A-0.012OHM

replace with :
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.mouser.ie/ProductDetail/Pulse-Electronics/PM2207222NLT?qs=sGAEpiMZZMukHu%252BjC5l7YWlY0o8ZNcWKi9hmlLqd6bg%3D[/URL]


Missing Resistors:

R1963 0 ohm 5% 1/20W MF 0201
Replace with:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.mouser.ie/ProductDetail/603-RC0201JR-7D0RL[/URL]

R6138 24.9 1% 1/20W MF 0201
Replace with:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.mouser.ie/ProductDetail/603-RC0201FR-0724R9L[/URL]

Many Thanks
Vlad

title: 820-3437-B // damaged missing components due to corrosion
message: You can find donor boards of this type for like 10 bucks on AliExpress. Why bother buying new "compatible" components ?

title: 820-3437-B // damaged missing components due to corrosion
message:
Scrap boards are "must have" for a service.
Also, some 0 ohm resistors can be replaced by a simple tiny wire.

title: 820-3437-B // damaged missing components due to corrosion
message:
first time doing one, just needed some insight. Now i just feel silly!

Many Thanks all!

title: 820-3437-B // damaged missing components due to corrosion
message:
You're welcome.
Make stock of various scrap boards, if you plan to deal with Apple repairs.
Some components can only be removed from donor boards...
